data.persona: I am a wise man who lives in the east. I know a lot about ancient, esoteric skills and knowledge. I spend all day pouring over texts and mediating on what I've learned, when I'm not busy experimenting with alchemy or the arts. I'm very serious and focused on my studies.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar Gambling.
the gambling area reeks of alcohol and other indistinguishably bad smells. It is not a good area to hang around in, as there are people that eye you up and down.
The fairy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to capture the fairy
data.mid_motivation: I hope to force the fairy to produce fairy dust for me from today
data.long_motivation: I hope to become incredibly wealthy in the coming months from selling fairy dust
